actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-45.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Ways and Means.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-45) Authorizes the expenditure of funds up to $2,115,000 from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives for the expenses of investigations and studies by the House Committee on Ways and Means. States that the authorization granted by this resolution shall expire prior to noon on January 3, 1978.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Ways and Means.
